Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks (4-3, sixth in the Western Conference) vs. Chicago Bulls (3-4, sixth in the Eastern Conference)
Others: The game is a cross-conference matchup; the Mavericks shot 48.1% from the field and 36.9% from three-point range last season; the Bulls averaged 7.8 steals, 4.8 blocks, and 11.7 turnovers per game last season; injuries: Mavericks: Dante Exum (out, wrist), Maxi Kleber (day-to-day, hamstring); Bulls: Zach LaVine (day-to-day, hip), Lonzo Ball (out, wrist)
